description: This file contains utility functions related to filtering and sorting products in a web frontend e-commerce platform. It includes functions to parse query string parameters, apply filters to product lists based on selected criteria, sort products according to different keys, and count products by various facets (categories).

methods.name: parseMulti(qs, key)
methods.description: Parses multi-select query parameters supporting repeated keys (?k=a&k=b) or comma-separated values (?k=a,b), returning an array of strings.

methods.name: applyFilters(products, selected)
methods.description: Filters a list of products based on selected filter criteria including families, sizes, collections, colors, badges, and price ranges.

methods.name: sortProducts(list, sortKey)
methods.description: Sorts a list of products based on specified sort key such as price ascending, descending, new, or best-sellers.

methods.name: countByFacet(products, facets)
methods.description: Counts products by various facets such as families, sizes, collections, colors, badges, and price ranges.
